metadata.dc:title: Linfoma de Hodgkin en paciente con enfermedad de Crohn tratada con azatioprina y anticuerpos antifactor de necrosis tumoral α
[Hodgkin's lymphoma in a patient with Crohn's disease treated with azathioprine and antibodies anti tumor necrosis factor α].
